messages.content: Can you get the current time and if the current tome is more than 10 pm just create a good night story and save it , you can think of the appropriate name and also tell me who is the current user of the system
# The current time is 2025-07-13 23:31:29, and the current user is anubhav. Since it's past 10 PM, I've created a good night story and saved it as good_night_story.txt.
